description: Capabilities I've developed or discovered, with proficiency notes

entries.name: Philips Hue Control
entries.notes: Can control lights via hue.js script. Commands: list, on, off, brightness, scene. 5 lights configured.

entries.name: Roomba Control (Charles)
entries.notes: dorita980 library installed. Can start/stop/dock. Haven't tested all functions yet.

entries.name: Git Version Control
entries.notes: Standard git operations. Workspace initialized, first commit pending.

entries.name: Technical Research & Documentation
entries.notes: Can research topics via web_fetch, synthesize findings, create structured documentation. Used extensively for self-improvement project.

entries.name: Slack Messaging
entries.notes: Can send messages, read channels, use formatting. Used for Henry collaboration in The Roast Chamber.

entries.name: Notion API
entries.notes: Can create pages and databases. Used for Futodama and Self-Improvement projects. Need more practice with queries.
